devdoc.author: Aave

balanceDecreaseAllowed(address,address,u.details: Checks if a specific balance decrease is allowed (i.e. doesn't bring the user borrow position health factor under HEALTH_FACTOR_LIQUIDATION_THRESHOLD)

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params.oracle: The address of the oracle contract
params.reserves: The list of all the active reserves
params.reservesData: The data of all the reserves

returns._0: true if the decrease of the balance is allowed*

devdoc.title: GenericLogic libraryImplements protocol-level logic to calculate and validate the state of a user
